title: [5.13] Core AP Items Pass

embed.description: Note: These changes aren't on the PBE yet! But will on the PBE once we switch over to testing the new patch stuff. TL;DR - We're changing AP Items! NLR is cheaper! More things give 80 AP! More things build out of NLR!

body: The game is changing for AP!

replies.body: Full ap urgot? I think so.
Damn these changes might make me rethink my builds. I cri everytiem.
